content: here s the german translation - baby cardi kraus rechts gestrickt 1 courtesy of susanne here s the italian at la maglia di marica 2 thanks marica here s the spanish version thanks to mj in barcelona - copper kettles and woolen mittens 3 it s a simple little cardi with super speedy top-down seamless raglan construction and an optional i-cord button band my version was knit with less than 3 skeins of knit picks andean treasure sportweight alpaca on us 4 3 5mm needles at a gauge of 22sts = 4 in stockinette it s silly soft and a little fuzzy and toasty as can be the finished measurements are 20 at the chest and 10 in length so a 6-12 month sized baby or older or younger or something the sweater is a very basic easily adjustable pattern tweak till your heart s content use thinner yarn and smaller needles for a smaller sweater or thicker yarn and larger needles for a bigger one just be sure to adjust the length accordingly 1 http //jenniferhoel files wordpress com/2009/03/garter_cardi_german pdf 2 http //marizampa wordpress com/2010/04/19/cardigan/ 3 http //kettlesandmittens blogspot com/2010/06/garter-yoke-baby-cardigan-traduccion html
